titleStmt.title: Aime at an up-shot for infant baptisme by the good will of Christ as priest, prophet and King, to fill the earth with his glory / by Henry Whistler.
titleStmt.author: Whistler, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, for Thomas Paybody ... and are to be sold by Thomas Underhill ... and John Ridley ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages 91-94 lacking ; pages 80-101 from Bodleian Library copy spliced at end. Title card on film erroneously attributes copy to Bodleian Library.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
